Title: Outlook 2010 like Navigation Pane WPF Control
Description:
This is a WPF control wich encapsulates the MS Outlook NavigationPane functionality.
It fully supports WPF styling, so you can stylize it by your own graphical preferences, if you are an artist deep in your hearth.
It comes with a default style wich is more like Outllok 2010.
HomeWiki:
Project Description:
This is a Windows Presentation Foundation(WPF) control which encapsulates the MS Outlook NavigationPanel functionality.
It fully supports WPF styling, so you can stylize it by your own graphical preferences, if you are an artist deep in your hearth.
It comes with a default style wich is more like Outllok 2010.
